active.title: 🔮 GOD TRADER — LunarCrush Sentiment Integration
active.progress: ✅ LIVE (Feb 19 11:28). LunarCrush CLI + sentiment.py + bot integration complete. Parses price, %, AltRank, sentiment, themes from free-tier AI endpoints. Confidence multiplier (0.5x-1.5x) on every signal. Veto system, divergence detection wired. First live scan: BTC=STRONG_BULLISH (83%, AltRank #39), ETH=STRONG_BULLISH (88%). Free tier: 4 req/min → 10-min cache, 5-min cooldown. GitHub: commits 56de55e + 98d8450.

active.title: last30days v2.1 Skill — ✅ OPERATIONAL (Gemini CLI backend)
active.progress: ✅ FULLY CONFIGURED. Researches topics from last 30 days across Reddit (Gemini 3 Pro), X, YouTube, web. Generates copy-paste prompts. Uses GEMINI_CLI=true in ~/.config/last30days/.env (no OpenAI key needed). Custom gemini_reddit.py module is drop-in compatible with original. First call takes 2-3 min on Gemini 3 Pro capacity, then faster.
